!Warehouse Chief Natools: Our organization takes a neutral stance in any dispute over power or ideology, nor am I personally interested in those things. Normally we accept our missions based on the size of the payment. In this case, however, both sides have offered us the same amount... So I am giving this to you to decide. Choose well -- our organization will abide by your decision. [Quest _141_ShadowFoxPart3 30894-15.htm|"Before I choose, can you give me more information about each request?"]
